text: alji moshaneun jadeul-i malhagil “wae hananimkkeseoneun uliege malsseum-eul geoljido anh-eusigo uliege jingpyoga dolaehajido anhneun geos-inga?” geuleohge geudeul ijeon-ui jadeuldo geudeul-ui malgwa yusahan geos-eul malhayeoss-euni geudeul-ui ma-eum-i seolo dalm-assdoda. imi naneun gudgeonhi midneun salamdeul-eul wihae myeongbaeghi jingpyodeul-eul deuleonaeeossnola
